name: Lekki Conservation Centre
address: Lekki Conservation Centre Rd, Lekki Penninsula II, Lekki 106104, Lagos
description: The Lekki Conservation Center in Lekki, Nigeria, is an oasis of nature within the urban chaos of Lagos, and the suspended canopy walkway that rises over the reserve is the longest in all of Africa.

name: Annang Festival of Arts & Culture (AFAC)
description: AFAC is more than just a festival; it's a strategic model for effective travel, trade, business, and enduring unity through cultural synergy.
